any size to fit the plastic ornament of your choosing this bauble ornament is crocheted flat once you ve made your rectangle we will join the edges with a slip_stitch last we will place the plastic ornament into the crocheted piece and close the top & bottom this is a great project for diving into your stash and making gifts easy peasy ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✔️ guide to make the hat with any weight yarn ✨ what you will need to make this festive bauble ornament✨ yarn wecrochet upcycle worsted 1 - 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 219yds/100g colorway shown sage weight 4 worsted yarn quantities 30+70 yds 1 ball for all sizes yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 crochet hook g 4 0mm crochet hook 5 ✨ hey i m briana k ✨ join the autumn-inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience we ll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection i ve designed this collection to be fun and easy with only 1-2 seams required you ll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces make them for yourself or as gifts i ve enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style join me and let s crochet together for the entire collection visit https //brianakdesigns etsy com/listing/1606279143 6 -
